CustomField.description: If checked, the User Story is marked as ready to be promoted. The user story will appear as 'Ahead' and available to be selected in the Branch Management and Promotion pages.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the User Story is marked as ready to be promoted. The user story will appear as 'Ahead' and available to be selected in the Promotion and Branch Management pages.
CustomField.label: Ready to Promote
